name: 2albii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wb(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wb(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Inference adding two universal quantifiers to both sides of an equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1997.)
